content: It was not that great.

Fun so far

content: Boring, I was looking forward to buying this but their just isnt enough to do, wish I wouldn't of wasted my money, played for 30 mins and deleted
replyContent:
Hi Terry.
Sorry you arnt satisfied, have you requested a refund? If not you should be able to do so through the Play Store. We‚Äôre releasing a new prestige mechanic this month, nevertheless thanks for trying and fingers crossed a future update might swing you.

content: While I appreciate that there isn't micro transactions and adds with a purchasable incremental idle "game", the "game" is very much just an incremental idle Sim rather than game, effectively you just rinse and repeat the same steps to increase your cashflow with no real variation, very simplistic and boring in a market flooded with idle games with far more depth. Has some good features and a good engine, however very little depth, possibly good for people new to idle games.
replyContent:
Hi Neil, firstly thanks for the review and for supporting us. We hear you loud and clear, we‚Äôre pushing a new Prestige system this month that should help alleviate that stalemate that can set in. It will provide varying bonuses and powerful incentives to start afresh, allowing you to zip back through with a novel power up. Again thank you,
Lawrence

content: Very fun game so far, picked it up today and I've been enjoying it so I'd say it's worth the buy

I purchased on principle. I hate the ad driven pay to win games. You get my $3 for using a non-predatory business model. I will also try the game, but I will never regret contributing to your business.
Its ok. Not bad, ideas are pretty cool. But paying to play a game with an energy meter is pretty stupid. You can play for a minute or so every half an hour, hurray!
replyContent:
Hey Edgar,
I‚Äôd you delve into the research tree you‚Äôll be able to get your Sugar Production and Storage to be much more effective. In the mean time ensure you‚Äôre making the most of the other extra earning mechanics like Jobs, Quests and Staff Management.
Thanks for the support and your feedback, we‚Äôre always looking to
Improve the game, HNY!
Loz.

content: It's okay but it's very laggy whenever you buy an upgrade or collect a reward. It's just not up to the quality of the free games with ads.
replyContent: Hi sorry, you are experiencing performance issues, we will look at this ASAP! In the meantime, you can chat with us on discord https://discord.gg/pbZcFfc if you have any more issues or more feedback to give us!

content: Great idle game, love the music, not too complicated and is fun to play Recommended - 5/5
I love the concept of the game waiting for that update to drop. Developers actually contact you.
replyContent: Hi, Please try enabling the Power Saving and Visual Effects toggles in the Settings menu as this will increase performance. The reduction in Points is expected after a competition ends, this is to reset players somewhat to ensure the next contest is fair, with players starting from similar positions. For more info please visit our FAQs. Thanks,

content: No depth

content: The game has cute animations and seems bug free but dosen't really have any depth. I appreciate the one time purchase (no in app purchases impact gameplay) I just expected more depth from a premium idle game.
replyContent: Hi Brie! Just to let you know, we have just pushed a new update that has an entirely new research tree system! Check it out if you have the time :) You can also chat to us on discord if you have any more feedback or suggestions!

content: It's an okay game but the sugar mechanic is kind of annoying for me

content: Premium idle game. Enough said.

content: It's fun and stuff, but I got a bit of a gamebreaking bug that, no matter what I did, it would never save my progress. Otherwise, I don't think I'll keep the game.
replyContent: We now have a fix for this, please give the latest update a go!

content: Nice visuals, game mechanics need to be fleshed out. Will revisit in a few months.

content: Pretty fun so far.

content: Very fun game! The gameplay is very addictive. I love the in-depth choices you get for building your economy. The visuals are charming and perfectly fit the gameplay. Can recommend this game, lost hours to it!
replyContent: Thanks so much for the awesome review. Please tell your friends about the game and what they are missing out on :) All the best, Lawrence

content: No ads, no p2w, , which are goodbut nothing to go for. The base game is good abd seems bug free, graphically nice. Problem is there doesnt seem to be a huge variety of things to upgrade/do to make it more immersive. Dev needs to give more meaning to the upgrades abd maybe allow expansion/growth. (Played a few hours, will update if this exists in later stages but doesnt seem like it)
replyContent: Hi David! Thanks for the feedback, the next update will bring a Seasonal Research Tree and a Prestige mechanic, along with bug fixes and the usual polish. Fingers crossed this will address the lack of progression and expansion you've mentioned. Thanks for the support. Lawrence

content: I'm solely rating this one star because of their misleading ads on Reddit calling it the "First Premium Idle Game". Otherwise it's decent.
replyContent: Hi Skyler, fair play! We‚Äôve started correcting this to ‚ÄúFirst Multiplayer...‚Äù If you‚Äôve got anymore feedback please don‚Äôt hesitate to jump in our Discord (link in the in-game Settings). Thanks buddy

content: Awesome
replyContent: Glad you like it! :)

content: Im not really a fan of idle games, but this one seemed interesting. Most if not all games that are purchaseable on the google play store let you refund it for a while after purchasing it, though for some reason when I try to it says something about a policy? Im not very smart and don't know what it means. Kinda disappointing since I knew it would let me refund it and I just wanted to give it a chance. I do not know if it is on the game developers end, but overall its good if you like these games
replyContent: We are sorry about this issue, we don't have any control over refunds or Google Play's policies. If there's anything else we can help with please don't hesitate to join our Discord, linked within the in-game Settings Menu, where we and many players should be able to offer tips, tricks, assistance and upcoming features. Thanks for the support.

content: Cute game, haven't played a lot yet but enjoying it. Worth the price, especially since there are 0 ads and 0 gameplay-altering IAP. You can buy cosmetics. Current complaints: activating the sugar sweep thingy on just any tap that doesn't hit a specific object is kind of annoying. I activate it by accident all the time. The net value is either calculated differently in different menus or is confusing due to rounding. I went way past 3M before being allowed to upgrade to contract 6.
replyContent: Hi Gal, thanks for the feedback and the review, I've found the issue you highlighted, the required Net Worth was being rounded up but only on the UI. Fix is in, and will be resolved next build. Thanks a bunch! If you join our Discord via the Settings Menu and ping me I'll credit you with some Premium Currency for a free cosmetic. Cheers, Lawrence.

content: A really good game it gives you options to be as idle or active as you want
replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! Feel free to let us know what you'd like to see in the game!

content: This last update broke the game for me. All of my upgrades disappeared and I am no longer getting money while being idle. However the developer is quick and responsive with issues.
replyContent: Hi Tyler, really sorry this has happened to you. We'll do our best to restore your progress. Could you email us at contact@sidelesscubestudios.com and we'll give you further instructions :)

content: Great game, and very impressed with the devs. Encountered a bug where my data was wiped, the devs quickly contacted me and resolved the bug.
replyContent: Hi George. Firstly, we're really sorry! A patch is in the works that'll be out this week, resolving this rare bug. We can restore your progress and Trophies, we'll just need you to screenshot the in-game Settings menu with your User ID and Name, sent to contact@sidelesscubestudios.com. Please bear with us and thanks for supporting us!

content: Great idle game with only cosmetic purchases. An absolute blast to spend some extra free time during breaks. Easy to get into and has a steady progression.
This game is adorable and legitimately challenging! Keeps your mind busy which is very helpful these days.

Not terrible for an ad free game, but it seems very convoluted for no justifiable reason, and requires a bit too much active involvement to really Call itself an idle game. Progression early on is also very slow. Early game needs to be sped up a lot

Well balanced idle game with competitive multiplayer novelty. It‚Äôs quite simple on the face of it but scales well and the Competitions are great! Management choices play into the multiplayer competitions, I don‚Äôt play that actively so use longer timers with the added passive but I'm doing well in the competitions. Rarity-based Upgrades are neat, you get given new quotes every minute or so. Performance is solid with graphical options. Happy to support premium games with cosmetic only IAPs.
Not worth it
replyContent: Hi CJ, thanks for the feedback, is there anything in specific you didn't like about the game? We'd love to hear your feedback.

content: Enjoying this so far. Like the style of it, looking forward to see how it develops.
Ok idle game. Grindy, but big plus points for a premium game (only cosmetic iap). Developers actively listen to players, which is another big plus.
replyContent: The update is now out, you are no longer required to be online when the competition ends :)

content: Decent game. No prestige kind of bums me out for idle games.
replyContent: Hey Matt, thanks for the support! Prestige is in the works currently, if you'd like to be notified when it's available join our Discord channel or follow us on Twitter.

content: Great game, has more mechanics than just your normal cookie clicker kind of game. Loads of upgrades and extra activities to keep it fresh.

Game has some really poor mechanics. A sugar mechanic that activates when you just try move the screen about, which is an issue being as to how it's a valuable resource. Doesn't really explain anything, next to the money is a sweet logo, no idea what that means. Constantly gives a warning about low sugar, that brings up a screen that tells you to do something about it, problem is I don't want to adjust stuff for it. So get the notice anytime I move the screen. Don't bother with the game.
replyContent: We have a new update out that fixes the issues with the sugar draining when moving the screen and you can now remove the notification reminder. Regarding what to do about low sugar, the management options for the factory are vital to how much sugar you use!

content: Definitely not spaceplan. I was excited to see another premium idle game out there, and was excited to see what a (albeit cheap) premium experience would bring. And it's just a dull experience with nothing new from free numbers go up simulators. Keep an eye on it if you like these things, but wait to see if anything actually fun is added.
replyContent: We're sorry you didn't enjoy our game! We have new features in the pipeline to create more things for players to do! If you want to chat more about what you didn't like, give us an email at contact@sidelesscubestudios.com or join our discord!

content: Fun idle game
replyContent: Thanks!

content: Extremely confusing game, nice graphics but they don't make up for the full gameplay.
replyContent: Hi Ian, we have since updated the game with new info toggles throughout the game that explain each feature in more detail and added more descriptive text to help users understand various menus. We also have a new FAQ and Tutorial Video added to our settings menu, would love if you would give it another go!

content: It's a game about optimizing production. If you like egg inc or other incremental games, you'll like this one. The developers don't allow offline play though. You have to connect to the internet to get offline earnings and that doesn't fit into my lifestyle since I'm constantly in off grid areas.
replyContent: Hi Sebastian, thank you for the feedback! The game is playable offline, but we do require you to be online when collecting your offline earnings, this is to stop players from changing their device clocks and gaining an unfair advantage.

content: Quite fun so far! Love not having to watch a billion ads to enjoy the game!
I bought it via a Reddit advert I saw. Developers seem cool and communicative. Looking good so far üëç
Decent so far.

I enjoy it. You invest your continuous income into ever more expensive equipment that boosts your income by some percentage. It took a few minutes to get into a groove and understand the basic gameplay. Currently, the in app purchases are for changing the surrounding theme, and it would cost about $8.50 to get all of the choices. I would argue that that's fair. I might grab something just to support them a bit more. There is a frame hiccup about once a minute on my phone.
Charming game
Sooo addicting! üòç Game has kept me playing for hours. Looking forward for future updates great job devs! ‚ù§Ô∏è
a satisfying incremental game!
Awesome! Small typo on the introduction (says 'what' twice in a row: 'you're the manager of a sweet company but what what will it become?' )
replyContent: Thanks for spotting that! We'll get this fixed in the next build :)
